body: testRunner: ${1:JUnit} # Options: 'JUnit', 'NUnit', 'VSTest', 'XUnit' # Required  # Format of test result files generated by your choice of test runner e.g. JUnit, VSTest, XUnit V2 and NUnit.
testResultsFiles: ${2:**/TEST-*.xml}  # Required  # Test results files path.  Wildcards can be used.  For example, `**/TEST-*.xml` for all xml files whose name starts with TEST-.

#mergeTestResults:  # Optional  # To merge results from all test results files to one test run in Azure Pipelines, check this option. To create a test run for each test results file, uncheck this option.
#testRunTitle:  # Optional  # Provide a name for the Test Run.
#platform:  # Optional  # Platform for which the tests were run.
#configuration:  # Optional  # Configuration for which the tests were run.
#publishRunAttachments:  # Optional  # Opt in/out of publishing test run level attachments.
Publish test results.description: Publish test results to Azure Pipelines
